options.content:
# Intro

This dashboard compares actual resource usage for Mimir compared to [official sizing rules](https://grafana.com/docs/mimir/latest/manage/run-production-environment/planning-capacity/).

# How to read it

On top of the dashboard, you see your actual volume of processed data.

- The green "actual" line is the real actual resource usage on this cluster.
- The red "reserved" line is the reserved resources (via pod's resource `requests`).
- The purple "expected" line is the estimation of expected resource usage according to Grafana sizing rules.

# limitations

On small clusters, we may be higher than expected because of incompressible resources.
